basics.name: Christopher West
basics.label: Software Developer & Architect
basics.summary: I am a skilled developer commited to code quality and maintainability.  I am well organized, a problem solver and put great pride on my work. I'm always ready to learn new things and believe everything has room for improvement.

work.summary: Senior backend developer for both rallysportdirect.com and northridge4x4.com. Architect of new systems and integrations.
highlights: Designed the development, testing, and release flows for entire development department.
Architected and developed several high priority projects including multi-warehouse shipping logic for split shipments, and integration with multiple ERP's.
Trained our tester on version control and the linux terminal so he could also manage our deploys.

work.summary: Lead developer and co-architect of a large scale CMS.
highlights: Hired as the very first employee of the company and worked directly with the owners.
Wrote all of the unit tests for the CMS by following the "test first" strategy.
Developed and co-architected a "one-size-fits-all" CMS application for enterprise business solutions.

work.summary: Fixed bugs, wrote new web applications in the Symfony2 framework.
highlights: Co-architected and developed new website complete with order processing, payment processing, management, etc...
Wrote and maintained unit tests by following the "test first" strategy.
Trained our tester on version control and the linux terminal so she could also manage our deploys.
Designed the development, testing, and release flows for entire development department.
Co-developed JSON-RPC api for interfacing with the legacy site as we replaced it's features one by one.

work.summary: Automated interdepartmental tasks and developed applications for content management.
highlights: Pioneered the automated collection of data from suppliers. This increased data collection productivity by 500%, reduced overhead needs of the Data Entry Department from 7 to 3 full-time positions and eliminated human error.
Developed a class hierarchy for processing payments through multiple gateways such as Authorize.net and PaymentXP without needing to rewrite code.
Researched and implemented document capture technology
Trained employees on web scraping and intelligent document capture.

awards.title: 2nd Place All-State - 3D Animation
awards.summary: 2nd place award in a 3D animation contest between students throughout Utah.
